author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
I just wasted 3h of my life because of this... For Withdrawals, we call the validator index `validator_index` but for PartialPendingWithdrawal we called it `index`... Why do we hate ourselves? ðŸ˜… 

What about changing `index` to `validator_index` for PartialPendingWithdrawal? I can put a PR up but wanted to get a temperature check if anyone opposes to this!

content: Ha sorry. I would support a PR which does this.
